item.description:
exalted is a Wight Wolf game that i have played for many years when i lived down south. i was hoping to run a game here up north. i am looking for 4 to 6 players. all so if some one wants to GM this and knows the world i open it to them. i can GM but i like playing more then GMing. if i run this game it will be an evil group of exalted attacking the the south lands. i am open to play any day of the week, i want to play this game and will make time work for us. all so the location is all so open to be moved.

i thought i would start off with a medium length game with a clear goal for you all to start with. then if you all like the game i was going to open the world up to the group and let you all roll play out the story how you like. with miner goals established from the first story. i don't know how well you know this game but it is going to run as an anti hero/ villain game where you all will ether play as abyssal (deathkights), corrupt solars (champions of the unconquered sun), and my be infernal (green sun princes). i have all the books as PDF just let me know if you need them.
item.name: Evil Exalted Game
